House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To extend the existing temporary suspension of duty for certain small toys and novelty goods, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1994, the duty on certain small toys and novelty goods. Increases the duty on certain other novelty goods.

titles.title: To extend the existing temporary suspension of duty for certain small toys and novelty goods, and for other purposes.
